lines.text:
[Condescendingly after Jeff has fallen off his horse]
After all, it was just a little accident. One time or another, I suppose, I've broken about every bone in my body.

[Clearly annoyed at him]
Except your neck!

[Condescendingly]
I do hope you'll come over often now that we're to be neighbors.

[Cattily]
Why how nice of you! I'll be sure to... particularly as we have so much in common.
[She laughs at the joke she's about to make]
